title: Music for Designing: New CD cover
content:

Font: Flaemische Kanzleischrift by Dieter Steffman

 [‹ Assistance with typeface \> font creation](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123428/http:/typophile.com/node/20480 "Go to previous forum topic") [typefaces with ch ligature ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123428/http:/typophile.com/node/20590 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fontplayer

comments.content:
are these meant to look good?

[Communication Design, Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123428/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)
They are meant to have fun. But if you have any feedback, I’d be glad to consider it. I’ve never had any training, but I am willing to learn.
